# List of ambassadors of the Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic to Ecuador

|incumbentsince  =
|style           = His Excellency
|residence       =
|appointer       = The president
|inaugural       =
|formation       =
}}
The ambassador of the Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic to Ecuador is the official representative of the Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic (SADR) to Ecuador. The Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic's embassy in Ecuador is located in Quito.
Ecuador first recognised the SADR in 1983, although relations were then frozen until February 8, 2006. An embassy was then opened in 2015.
